decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Planning Design and Access Statement January 2024; Fire Safety Strategy; 2729 TITLE PLAN; 14PL AS EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN SHOWING LAYOUT OF ORIGINAL  HOUSE AND ATTACHED NEW  DEVELOPMENT AS APPROVED; 13P AS EXISTING FIRST FLOOR PLAN AND SECOND FLOOR PLAN TO APPROVED NEW DEVELOPMENT; 11/19 APPROVED DEVELOPMENT SHOWING FRONT AND SIDE ELEVATIONS AS EXISTING; 06E AS EXISTING REAR AND SIDE ELEVATIONS TO APPROVED NEW DWELLING SHOWING STRUCTURE AS EXISTING AND EXTERNAL WORKS TO BE COMPLETED; 10PBR AS PROPOSED NEW DEVELOPMENT BASEMENT PLAN AND GROUND FLOOR PLAN SHOWING  EXISTING STRUCTURE; 13PR AS PROPOSED FIRST FLOOR PLAN AND SECOND FLOOR  PLAN TO APPROVED NEW DEVELOPMENT; 08CR AS PROPOSED LOFT LAYOUT, ROOF PLAN AND SECTION THROUGH  SHOWING PROPOSED AMENDMENT TO EXISTING REAR DORMER AND ROOF STRUCTURE; 1120ER AS PROPOSED FRONT AND SIDE ELEVATIONS TO APPROVED NEW DWELLINGS
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Alteration to the ground floor side elevation; alteration of roof from hip to gable end and roof extension to rear (main) roof slope; and installation of two roof light to main roof
